# 1. Naples (NAPL)

## a. algae biomass timeseries
```{r}
napl_algae_plot_list <- rep(NaN, length(algae_spp))

for(i in 1:length(algae_spp)) {
  # choose a species from the list
  this_sp <- algae_spp[i]
  
  # plot the species biomass timeseries
  plot <- spp_biomass_ts(this_sp, "NAPL")
  
  # plot name list
  napl_algae_plot_list[[i]] <- paste("napl", this_sp, sep = "_")
  
  # make a separate object for the plot
  assign(paste("napl", this_sp, sep = "_"), plot)
}

napl_ANPA

```
